messages.unwellEnvironment: You have been logged out or lost connection to the system. Please try logging in again.
messages.unknownErrorAdminInfo: An unknown error, or an error without an error message, has occurred. Please contact the system administrator.
messages.articleMissingDescription: No article document has been specified. Navigate back to the overview and try again.
messages.failedUpdatingListRetrying: Failed to automatically update the list. Retrying in {{seconds}} seconds.
messages.documentTypeMissingDescription: No {{documentType, lowercase}} has been specified. Navigate back to the overview and try again.
messages.statusChangeforDocumentTypeFailed: Could not change the status of the {{documentType, lowercase}}! A linked planning could not be found.
messages.scheduleArticleFailed: Could not schedule article! The time or date has been specified incorrectly.
messages.flashCreationFailed: The flash could not be created.
messages.createAssignmentError: The flash has been created. Unfortunately, linking it to a planning failed.
messages.failedToLoadHistory: An error occurred when fetching the document history.
messages.failedToLoadMetaData: An error occurred when fetching the metadata.
messages.changeStatusError: Could not change the status. The assignment's publishing time could not be changed in the linked planning.

toasts.snapshotError: The planning has been changed locally but could not be saved.
toasts.assignmentMoveError: The assignment could not be moved
toasts.assignmentMoveErrorNotLoggedIn: The assignment could not be moved. You are not logged in.
toasts.assignmentMoveErrorTryAgain: The assignment could not be moved. Please try again.
toasts.unableToAutorise: Unable to authenticate with the image service
toasts.showPictureFailed: Cannot display the image, invalid ID.
toasts.multipleAuthors: Multiple author documents found, please contact support
toasts.addAssignmentToPlanningError: Could not add the assignment to a linked planning
toasts.couldNotScheduleArticle: Could not schedule article! The time or date has been specified incorrectly.
toasts.fetchStatusFailed: An error occurred when fetching the current status. Please try reloading the page.
toasts.couldNotChangeStatusReloadBrowser: An error has occurred, the current status could not be changed! Reload the browser and try again.
toasts.couldNotChangeStatus: An error occurred when changing the current status.
toasts.couldNotSaveStatus: An error occurred when saving the current status.
toasts.couldNotFindPlanningSection: Could not find the section for the planning
toasts.authorCreateFailure: Could not create author document: Failed to create author doc
toasts.authorCreateUndefinedFailed: Could not create author document: Failed to fetch author document: undefined

systemMessages.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to the messaging service, please reload the window.
